textos_fuente.text: About Bay 13 Brewery | Locally Brewed Beers in Miami — Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Home About Menu Folder: Beer Back Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Folder: Happenings Back Specials Events Other Projects Folder: Bookings Back Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist Book an Event Our Story Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen was conceived by two recovering accountants turned hospitality entrepreneurs, aimed at showcasing Melbournian hospitality. Bay 13 is focused on a deliberate and comfortable environment serving quality beer, and quality food with friendly, professional service in a relaxed atmosphere. With the addition of a very deliberate, high-quality, and beer-focused menu, we are aiming to bring something truly unique to the South Florida beer market. The beer menu is fresh and will change regularly showcasing a global offering of beer styles, of course including some great Southern Hemisphere style beers. Our Team Nick Sharp - Owner Nick came to Miami in 2012 as an accountant at a dairy commodity trading company. In 2014 with his wife Teresa, opened Threefold Café on Giralda Avenue in the Gables aiming to recreate a small piece of their hometown of Melbourne, which is so heavily served with great coffee and all-day breakfast. Since that time Nick has undertaken a variety of ventures in Miami from Miami Beach to Key Biscayne but his home is definitely Coral Gables where he has four operating locations. Nick is an active member in the community serving on the Executive Board of the Coral Gables Business improvement district as well as a variety of other panels, committees, and task forces. Greg Berbusse - Head Brewer Hailing from Little Rock, AR Greg was recruited to Bay 13 Brewery and Kitchen at the end of 2019, moving down early in the near year of 2020. If Miami wasn’t a large enough shock to the system, the first port of call was being shipped off to Australia to do a 10-day whirlwind brewery tour of Sydney, Canberra, and Melbourne.  Back to Bay 13 to oversee the final (and long) stages of the construction process, Greg was finally able to begin brewing in November for the December grand opening. The starting range was a huge hit with the most common comment being “a menu with beer-flavored beer”! Get in touch Name * First Name Last Name Email * Message * Subject General Inquiries Media Inquiries Other Thank you! Location 65 Alhambra Plaza, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Contact gday@bay13brewery.com (786) 452-0935

Jobs at Black Isle Drink in Nature Blog Trade Get In Touch At Black Isle Brewery, we are passionate crafting exceptional organic beers and creating great experiences at our bars in Inverness and Fort William We're proud to be a pioneer in organic brewing and are committed to sustainability in all we do. Looking for information or need to get in touch? You’re in the right place. Whether you want to contact brewery, enjoy a visit to one of our bars, or stay at our hostel, we've made it easy to find the contact details you need. Below you’ll find direct contact information for each location. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to the relevant contact listed. Enjoy your visit, and we look forward to hearing from you! Brewery/Shop Old Allangrange, Munlochy IV8 8NZ shop@blackislebrewery.com 01463 811 871 Our brewery shop is open daily to take away all your favourite beer and tours take place throughout the day. Black Isle Bar Inverness inverness@blackislebar.com 01463 229920 The bar in central Inverness is open daily serving all our organic craft beer and organic pizzas. We have seating indoor and out. Black Isle Bar Fort William fortbill@blackislebar.com 01397 700876 The bar in Fort William is open daily serving all our organic craft beer and organic pizzas. We have seating indoor and out. Walk-in only. Black Isle Hostel Inverness info@blackislehostel.com 01463 233933 Our hostel in central Inverness is a great budget friendly choice only a stones throw from the bus and train stations. Black Isle Calling blackislecalling@gmail.com Black Isle Calling is being managed by an external events company. Thay can be contacted directly on the email address above. Trade Enquiries Black Isle Brewing Co, Old Allangrange, Munlochy, IV8 8NZ Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Cookie Policy Delivery & Returns Contact Us

Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen | Craft Beer, Delicious Food, and Fun Events in Miami Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Home About Menu Folder: Beer Back Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Folder: Happenings Back Specials Events Other Projects Folder: Bookings Back Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist Book an Event Craft Beer, Delicious Food & Fun Events Book a table Locally Brewed, Expertly Crafted Beers Explore our beers Your Go-To Spot for Light Bites & Craft Beer in Miami View Food Menu Live Music, Private Parties & Community Events Book your event Find a Local Brewery: Aussie Brewpub in Miami About BAY 13 Bay 13 Brewery and Kitchen is a locally owned, independent brewery in Coral Gables, offering fresh craft beer, delicious food, and a relaxed atmosphere. Our Aussie-inspired brewpub is all about quality. Great beer, great food, and exceptional service. As an independent craft brewery, our beer menu is always fresh and rotating, featuring a variety of styles from around the world, including signature Southern Hemisphere-style beers. BEER FOOD HAPPY HOUR COLD. FRESH. LOCAL. Miami’s first Aussie brewpub Crisp, bold, and always fresh. Every pint is brewed with quality ingredients and a passion for great beer. Taste the love with every sip in Coral Gables' premier brewpub! Beer Menu our kitchen Discover our delightful fusion Made with fresh ingredients and bold flavors, every dish is crafted to hit the spot. Whether you're here for lunch, dinner, or a bite between beers, this will be your new go-to spot in the heart of Miami. Book a table ON ROTATION Latest Beer Releases Beer Catalogue Mango Drive Ales 4 ALS Zappo Hivemind Cölsch Oceana Eclipse Yewzu Vibes Drinks & Cocktails Craft Cocktails & Premium Spirits Our cocktails are spirit-forward, using premium ingredients and simple recipes to highlight each spirit’s unique character. Our backbar includes rare and allocated bourbon, scotch, tequila, and other global selections. View Menu Drinks & Cocktails Miami’s LARGEST Australian wine list From Penfolds to Yalumba, Bay 13 maintains an extensive, and exclusively Australian wine list and offers by the bottle & Coravin preserved pours by the ounce. What’s Happening upcoming events We host a variety of events throughout the year, including beer paired dinners, festivals, sports watch parties and various other fun activities. View Events Visit us at 65 Alhambra Plaza Coral Gables, FL 33134 Hours Monday - Thursday  11am–11pm Friday - 11am–12am Saturday - 10am–12am Sunday - 10am–11pm Email gday@bay13brewery.com Phone (786) 452-0935 Looking for the Perfect Spot in miami to Host Your Private Event? Host your private event at Bay 13. Perfect for corporate gatherings, celebrations, and special occasions. Book now Location 65 Alhambra Plaza, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Contact gday@bay13brewery.com (786) 452-0935

Table Crusher | American Pilsner — Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Home About Menu Folder: Beer Back Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Folder: Happenings Back Specials Events Other Projects Folder: Bookings Back Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist Book an Event Table Crusher The Basics Style - American Pilsner ABV - 5.5% Description Crisp, Clear, and endlessly refreshing Tablebreaker was brewed by and for the true supporters of Inter Miami FC: The Siege! The Name Tailgate tradition where Inter Miami fans jump on tables! The Ingredients Malts Pilsner Malt, Toasted Rice, Dextrin, and Maltodextrin Hops Incognito Citra and Meridian Hops Beer Facts Brewed by and for members of the best damn support club any CF has ever seen THE Siege!!! This  American Pils has a crisp malt character with some subtle notes of rice/corn from the brewing process (we used toasted rice) and was a collaboration brew meant to travel to the games for tailgates and be served by pitchers when our team is on the road. The Pairings Asian food/Pho; kettle corn, grilled meats and vegetables, ripened cheeses. Location 65 Alhambra Plaza, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Contact gday@bay13brewery.com (786) 452-0935

Brews from Down Under - Bay 13 Brewery Australian-style brewpub Skip to content Coral Gables Magazine The Magazine for business, culture, entertainment, and dining in Coral Gables The Magazine About Us Contact Us Archives Advertise Subscribe Magazine Subscription Newsletter Subscription Events Features Business Travel Streetwise City Hall Talk of the Town Historic Preservation Living Best Bets Night Out What to Watch Where to Shop Bites New Restaurants Happy Hour Quick Bites Fine Dining Dining Guide Community People The Seen Don’s Rambles Home & Garden Bites Brews from Down Under January 11, 2021 February 11, 2021 Lizzie Wilcox Bay 13 Brewery Opens on Alhambra From the people who brought you Threefold CafÃ© and Someoneâs Son, Bay 13 Brewery and Kitchen is an Australian-style brewpub that opened last month on Alhambra Plaza. Owner and Aussie Nick Sharp named his latest gastronomical venture after a section of the Melbourne Cricket Ground infamous for its rowdy spectators. They offer beers brewed in-house, an extensive Australian wine list and three different menus: Lunch, dinner and all-day. âYou can come here and spend $20 and have a couple beers. You can come here and spend $2,000 on wine,â said Sharp during Bay 13âs grand opening weekend. On the east end of Alhambra, directly across the street from the Hyatt Regency, the brewery has both indoor and outdoor seating â and an indoor and outdoor bar. The interior is spacious with the massive steel brewing vats on display. The exterior is inviting, with tables and cushioned chairs on artificial grass or under umbrellas on the patio. âItâs going to be welcoming, itâs going to be fresh, itâs going to be something different in South Florida.â Nick Sharp Owner, Bay 13 Brewery and Kitchen I donât know what I like better about Bay 13: The craft beers or their names. The Old Man is a very flavorful brew. A Belgian-style wheat ale, it has a âfluffyâ mouthfeel. My personal favorite is the Woop Woop. Partially because of its name â how could you not love it? â and partially because of its earthy and herbal notes from Australian hops. Hailing from Arkansas, Greg Berbusse is the head brewer. Unlike the casual pub food served at most breweries, Bay 13âs menu is elevated. It ranges from a zesty watercress salad with soft boiled egg, to fresh scallops served with corn sauce and radish, to strip loin steak that comes with a killer potato puree and a savory brown ale espresso sauce. Hats off to Head Chef Bjorn De La Cruz. Sharp emphasizes Australian hospitality at Bay 13. Whether youâre a day laborer or an investment banker, âItâs going to be welcoming, itâs going to be fresh, itâs going to be something different in South Florida,â he says. ← Gift Shops for Curious Travelers Raquel Regalado → Share This Post: Current Issue City Beautiful 1200 Anastasia Ave. Ste 115. Coral Gables, FL 33134. Other Projects Associated with Bay 13 Brewery — Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Open Menu Close Menu Home About Menu Beer Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Happenings Specials Events Other Projects Bookings Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist 0 0 Book an Event Home About Menu Folder: Beer Back Beer Menu Beer Archives Full Collection Cocktails Folder: Happenings Back Specials Events Other Projects Folder: Bookings Back Make a Reservation Group Events Join the waitlist Book an Event Melbourne Hospitality Group Threefold Cafe It all started with a love of good coffee. And maybe avocado on toast… With the move to a brand new city in 2012, owners, Nick and Teresa began searching for the specialty coffee lifestyle as they knew it, from their home, in Melbourne, Australia. In 2014, their first café opened in the Coral Gables neighborhood of Miami. Bringing a tried and tested concept inspired by the Melbourne cafe scene, Threefold Cafe executes breakfast and lunch fare consisting mainly of locally sourced ingredients, which rotates and changes regularly. Visit Website Deco Coffee Co. Deco Coffee Co. was established to source, roast, and serve exceptional coffees we love to drink. Our mission centers on partnering directly with coffee farms globally, ensuring transparent sourcing that improves returns to the coffee’s origin. We are dedicated to comprehensive training and education, aiming to transfer the highest quality from our sourced and roasted beans to your cup. At Deco Coffee Co., we take coffee seriously, so you won’t find our coffee everywhere. However, when you do, it’s with like-minded, quality-focused partners who share our passion for excellence. Visit Website Location 65 Alhambra Plaza, Coral Gables, FL 33134 Contact gday@bay13brewery.com (786) 452-0935

Bay 13 Brewery | Coral Gables Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Bay 13 Brewery Find Venues / Florida / Coral Gables / Bay 13 Brewery Photo credit: Kristy and Vic Photography Bay 13 Brewery 65 Alhambra Plaza, Coral Gables, FL 33134, USA Max Seated 200 Max Standing 500 Request info Favorite Average Response Time 12-24 hrs Overview Gallery 3 About Bay 13 Brewery Our Story:
Bay 13 Brewery & Kitchen was founded by two former accountants who turned to be hospitality entrepreneurs with the goal of exhibiting Melbournian hospitality. Bay 13 focuses on providing a purposeful and comfortable environment in which to enjoy high-quality beer and food while receiving courteous, professional service in a relaxing setting. We hope to contribute something truly unique to the South Florida beer market with the inclusion of a highly thoughtful, high-quality, and beer-focused menu. The beer selection is always changing, presenting a diverse range of beer styles from throughout the world, including some excellent Southern Hemisphere brews.

Private Events:
We host a variety of events ranging from milestone birthdays, social events, anniversaries, business dinners and meetings, receptions, showers, and more. Please contact us for more details and with any inquires!

Attendees: 500 guest maximum capacity

Amenities
- Full Bar / Lounge
- Fully Equipped Kitchen
- Outdoor Function Area
- Wireless Internet/Wi-Fi

At Bay 13 Brewery, we value our team and strive to provide genuine opportunities for them to grow in skill and knowledge as they work in the challenging, fast paced hospitality industry.

Review from Yelp:
"Bay 13 is not only a great, unique brewery in Coral Gables but it's also a place to consider for any event. Just celebrated my niece's engagement party for over 50 family and friends and Bay 13 exceeded our expectations. Kelly, Sam and the entire Bay 13 crew made sure every detail we envisioned became a reality. The service, food and overflow of craft beer and cocktails was perfection. Don't think too much about where your next birthday party, engagement celebration or even wedding will be, run to Bay 13 and book that event." Event Spaces 4 200 max seated • 500 max standing 2 Outside Lounge Patio 200 Seated 300 Standing Restaurant 1 Main Dining Room 120 Seated 200 Standing Restaurant 2 Bar Area 25 Seated 150 Standing Restaurant 1 Private Dining Room 40 Seated 60 Standing Restaurant Pricing Packages Bay 13 Brewery Pricing Minimum Spend $ 1,000 Est. Cost Per Guest $ 110 Taxes and fees included Catering included Beverages included Download PDF Request a Quote Amenities A/V Equipment Coat Check Handicap Accessible Kosher Kitchen Media Room Pet Friendly Pool Street Parking Valet Parking WiFi Windows Dance Floor Breakout Rooms In-house caterer only In-house suppliers only FAQs 5 How much does it cost to rent the venue? We require a food and beverage minimum spend based on the number of guests and the date. What is included in the venue rental cost? Food and Beverage, Furniture, Tablecloths, A/V, Dance Floor, Staffing What is the venue refund or cancellation policy? If the event is cancelled within of 60 days of the scheduled event, the deposit will be kept by the venue. What is the venue capacity? Up to 300 seated, 500+ standing INSIDE AND OUTSIDE. Does your venue have on-site parking available for guests? The venue features a parking garage directly below the venue (entrance is one block west) at the rate of $3.00 per hour OR street parking at the rate of $3.25 per hour.
